channel.title: Help changing char box and inventory background image
channel.description: ok i currently have a uggly image as inventory and chat box background and i dont know how to change it..pleas help..

item.title: Help changing char box and inventory background image
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

[quote=“nikolaww3, post:2, topic:323526”]ur a member and ur that dumb
its in spirts[/quote]

Your a member and your that dumb?
Sprites.* There isn’t a ‘Spirts’ folder…Check SPRITES folder and look at the images, if its .jag make a new batch file (.bat) with:

@Echo Off Title .JAG 2 .PNG rename *.jag *.png
^ Save as jag2png.bat ^

Then to rename it back to .jag use this:

@Echo Off Title .PNG 2 .JAG rename *.png *.jag

^ Save as png2jag.bat ^

Read full topic

If you don’t have it, it’s in your client.java.
